Text: Remove protective plugs from right PGA conn (2)
Remove suit hose interconnect from O2 hoses (CDR's)
Connect O2 umb (CDR's) to right PGA conn (2)
LH SUIT FLOW vlv - FULL FLOW
RH SUIT FLOW vlv - OFF
Disconnect LMP's O2 hose from left PGA conns
Connect protective plugs to left PGA conns
Install suit hose interconnect on O2 hoses (trnfr)
SUIT PWR - OFF
PWR - OFF
AUDIO CONT - NORM
Remove trnfr CCU from PGA conn
Connect CDR's (left) CCU to PGA
Install suit hose interconnect on O2 hoses (trnfr)
RH SUIT FLOW vlv - OFF (verify)
Connect hose interconnect to trnfr umbs (verify)
Pass trnfr umbs to LM
RH SUIT FLOW vlv - FULL FLOW
PWR - AUDIO/TONE
SUIT PWR - ON
Open PAMFD - Press ECS - Add LMP
